titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell, Receipt to J. H. Graham
CWG13824

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder Some 1862, 1863, Misc. Correspondence, Recommendation for Jobs, Claims for Pay, Vouchers for Expenses...Few on Ordinance

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To J. H. Graham Telgph opr Dr.

row.cell: Services rendered as telgph opr From March 1st 1863 to September 15 1863 Thirty dollars per month

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the articles were furnished as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

Jno W Finnell
adj genl. ky. vols
Received at , the of , 186, of , Quarter-master Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of One hundred & Eighty dollar Dollars and Cents, in full of the above account.

NO. 12.
No. 1 Abstract B 2 Qr. 186.
Jas H Graham
Dollars 180 00/100
Paid 22 Sept 1863.
Telegraphing
